title: Detoxzyme® Detox Supplement Capsules | Young Living Essential Oils
description: Detoxzyme® combines a myriad of powerful enzymes that complete digestion, help detoxify, and promote cleansing. Learn more and order today!
cleaned_text: Cumin, and Fennel Vitality essential oils with a myriad of powerful enzymes that help complete digestion, detoxify the body, and promote cleansing.* We've utilized enzymes with higher activity levels to concentrate a single serving of Detoxzyme into one capsule to help detoxify and promote healthy digestion.* Now available in a 90-count bottle, Detoxzyme works with the body to support normal function of the digestive system and help the essential functions that maintain and build health. We've combined Cumin, Anise, and Fennel premium essential oils with a myriad of powerful, fast-acting enzymes to help break down food after eating and support the digestive process. Take 1 capsule 3 times daily, between meals or as needed. This product may be used in conjunction with a detoxifying program. Supports normal function of the digestive system* Fast-acting enzymes help break down food after eating to support the digestive process* Helps detoxify and promote cleansing of the body* Utilizes a vegetarian enzyme complex* May be used in conjunction with a cleansing or detoxifying program* Keep out of reach of children. If you are pregnant, nursing, taking medication, or have a medical condition, consult a health care professional prior to use. Do not give this product to children under 12 years of age except under the supervision of a health care professional. If discomfort persists, discontinue use of this product and consult your physician.
